name: Keep Tackling And Everybody Explodes
description:
Keep Tackling and Everybody Explodes is a game where 2 players fight to keep a bomb. Warning ! If you hold the bomb to long, it can explode !

Use 2 gamepads to play. Press A to jump, B to tackle, X to throw the bomb and the joystick to move. Press 'O' to start a new game (only 3 bombs in a game).

Made by Wyzuj Maxime and Léa Hammoud during GGJ18.
